name: Traveller
description: A traveller looking to have his fortune told.

dialogs.buttonText: Do you know anything about a guy name Mound?
dialogs.responseText: Never heard of him, sorry. But I have heard there's a fortune teller here who might be able to help you. That's actually why I'm here.
Wow, rude. Guess you'll have to find his house on your own, beak-nose.
